Package MLS

Class RecBook

java.lang.Object
MLS.RecBook
public class RecBook extends Object
Use singleton design and simple file read/write system to manage text record and runtime record cache system. getSampleIns()

  • Method Details

    • getSampleIns

      public static RecBook getSampleIns​(int initialSize)
      Return a unique instance of RecBook only for an example. mlsSample.txt is its database and a record cache is implemented. An initial size of the singleton cache can be set. Contents of database will be randomized.
      Parameters:
      initialSize - int initial size of workable cache.
      Returns:
      Singleton instance of RecBook only for an example.

    • getInstance

      public static RecBook getInstance​(int initialSize)
      Return a unique instance of RecBook for working environment. mls.txt is its database for user to create and input. An initial size of the singleton cache can be set.
      Parameters:
      initialSize - int initial size of workable cache.
      Returns:
      Singleton Instance of working RecBook.

    • getSampleIns

      public static RecBook getSampleIns()
      If used 1st time when creating sample singleton, cache size is by default 50; if used after singleton creation, the singleton itself will be returned.
      Returns:
      Sample singleton instance of either default 50 or previously specified cache capacity.

    • getInstance

      public static RecBook getInstance()
      If used 1st time when creating formal singleton, cache size is by default 100; if used after singleton creation, the singleton itself will be returned.
      Returns:
      Formal singleton instance of either default 100 or previously specified cache capacity.

    • sampleRecGen

      public void sampleRecGen()
      Use random to generate given number of entries in mlsSample.txt file. Generates 20 properties. 5 of each: TripleDeckers, DetachedHome, Land, VacationHome.

    • write

      public void write​(mlsRecord mls)
      Write an entry of mlsRecord at the end of RecBook instance's database. Throw IOException.
      Parameters:
      mls - mlsRecord input to be written into database.

    • get

      public mlsRecord get​(UUID id)
      Get a mlsRecord from database using UUID. If it is already in runtime cache, return it directly. Otherwise search through database to find matching record, then change it into mlsRecord obj and cache inside RecBook instance's database.
      Parameters:
      id - UUID input of desired entry.
      Returns:
      mlsRecord obj or null if no record found.

    • remove

      public void remove​(UUID id)
      Remove an entry from database using UUID. If it is in cache, remove it as well.
      Parameters:
      id - UUID of the entry to be removed.

    • getPath

      public String getPath()
      Return the file path of current instance's record txt.
      Returns:
      String of record txt path.

    • setNewPath

      public void setNewPath​(String directory) throws IOException
      Relocate instance's record txt to a new directory. If the new directory contains "mls.txt" or "mlsSample.txt", replace it.
      Parameters:
      directory - String of new directory for relocation.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getMaxWeight

      public static int getMaxWeight()
      Getter for class MAX_WEIGHT value.
      Returns:
      int max weight.

    • setMaxWeight

      public static void setMaxWeight​(int maxWeight)
      Setter for class MAX_WEIGHT value. MAX_WEIGHT changes only when argument maxWeight is bigger than it.
      Parameters:
      maxWeight - int value of new max weight.

    • getNewWeight

      public static int getNewWeight()
      Getter for class NEW_WEIGHT value.
      Returns:
      int new entry weight.

    • setNewWeight

      public static void setNewWeight​(int newWeight)
      Setter for class NEW_WEIGHT value. Only accepts argument no bigger than MAX_WEIGHT.
      Parameters:
      newWeight - int new entry weight.

    • getUpWeight

      public static int getUpWeight()
      Getter for class UP_WEIGHT value.
      Returns:
      int update weight.

    • setUpWeight

      public static void setUpWeight​(int upWeight)
      Setter for class UP_WEIGHT value. Only accepts argument bigger than 0.
      Parameters:
      upWeight - int new update weight.
